prompt: Give me a list of married customers with at least two dependents in Arizona state. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
WHERE
  c.marital_status = 'married'
  AND c.number_of_dependents >= 2
  AND c.state = 'Arizona'; END

prompt: Identify customers aged 20-25 who graduated in last 3 months and applied for a credit card. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  c.age >= 20
  AND c.age <= 25
  AND le.life_event_type = 'graduation'
  AND le.life_event_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
  AND p.product = 'credit card'; END

prompt: List customers with a high credit score (above 700) who haven't yet enrolled in any loan or credit product. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.credit_score
FROM
  customers c
  LEFT JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  c.credit_score > 700
  AND p.customer_id IS NULL; END

prompt: Show me customers who used our mobile app more than 5 times in the past month. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_channel = 'mobile app'
  AND i.engagement_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
HAVING
  COUNT(i.interaction_id) > 5; END

prompt: List customers who frequently engage with our social media channels and have a high credit score. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.credit_score
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_channel = 'social media'
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id
HAVING
  COUNT(i.customer_id) > 1
  AND c.credit_score > 700; END

prompt: Identify customers who have interacted with our email promotions and have expressed interest in savings accounts. ->
completion:
SELECT DISTINCT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  m.marketing_campaign_response_channel = 'email'
  AND m.product_interest = 'savings accounts'; END

prompt: Provide a list of customers who hold both a savings account and a credit card. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  INNER JOIN products p1 ON c.customer_id = p1.customer_id
  AND p1.product_application_id = 'savings_account'
  INNER JOIN products p2 ON c.customer_id = p2.customer_id
  AND p2.product_application_id = 'credit_card' END

prompt: Identify customers who applied for an auto loan in last 3 months and also have a checking account. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  p.product = 'auto loan'
  AND p.product_application_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT
      1
    FROM
      products p2
    WHERE
      p2.customer_id = c.customer_id
      AND p2.product = 'checking account'
  ) END

prompt: Show me customers who have used our online banking services to pay bills and have expressed interest in mortgage loans. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  t.transaction_details LIKE '%pay bills%'
  AND p.product_interest = 'mortgage loan'; END

prompt: Give me a list of customers who had a new addition to their family (birth) in last 3 months and are interested in setting up a college savings account. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  le.life_event_type = 'birth'
  AND le.life_event_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
  AND m.product_interest = 'college savings account'; END

prompt: Identify customers who have bought a home in last 3 months and showed interest in home equity loans. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  le.life_event_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
  AND le.life_event_type = 'home'
  AND c.customer_id IN (
    SELECT
      customer_id
    FROM
      marketing
    WHERE
      product_interest = 'home equity loan'
  ) END

prompt: List customers who are approaching retirement age and have expressed interest in investment and retirement planning. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.date_of_birth,
  c.age,
  m.product_interest
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  c.age >= 55
  AND c.age < 60
  AND m.product_interest IN ('investment', 'retirement planning'); END

prompt: Provide a list of customers with high income levels who are interested in credit cards. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.income_level
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  c.income_level = 'high'
  AND m.product_interest = 'credit cards' END

prompt: Identify customers who frequently engage with our app and have shown interest in opening a checking account. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_type = 'app engagement'
  AND c.customer_id IN (
    SELECT
      customer_id
    FROM
      marketing
    WHERE
      product_interest = 'checking account'
  )
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
HAVING
  COUNT(i.interaction_id) > 1; END

prompt: List customers who took an auto loan product in last 3 months ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  p.product = 'auto loan'
  AND p.product_application_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH); END

prompt: Give me a list of customers who prefer email communication and have recently engaged with our promotions. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
  AND i.engagement_channel = 'promotions'
  AND c.contact_communication_type = 'email'; END

prompt: Identify customers who frequently use our mobile app and prefer to receive transaction alerts via text message. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.contact_communication_channel = 'mobile app'
  AND i.engagement_channel = 'text message'
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
HAVING
  COUNT(*) > 1; END

prompt: List customers who have interacted with our social media channels and are open to receiving promotions through social platforms. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  INNER JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_channel LIKE '%social media%'
AND i.contact_communication_channe='%social media%'
  AND i.contact_communication_type = 'promotions' END

prompt: Provide a list of customers who frequently use our online banking services and may be interested in mobile wallets. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.email_address
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id 
JOIN marketing m ON i.customer_id=m.customer_id 
WHERE
  i.engagement_type = 'online banking'
m.product_interest='mobile wallets'
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id
HAVING
  COUNT(DISTINCT i.interaction_id) > 1 END

prompt: Identify customers who have made multiple purchases using their credit cards and have expressed interest in rewards programs. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  t.transaction_amount > 0
  AND m.product_interest = 'rewards program'
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
HAVING
  COUNT(DISTINCT t.transaction_id) > 1; END

prompt: List customers who have recently made large transactions and may benefit from investment advisory services. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
count(*) as number_of_transactions
 FROM
  customers c
  JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id
WHERE
  t.transaction_amount > 10000
group by c.customer_id
having count(t.transaction_amount)>=1 END

prompt: Give me a list of customers in a specific city who have recently engaged with our online financial calculators. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.city,
  i.engagement_date
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  c.city = 'specific_city'
  AND i.engagement_channel = 'online'
  AND i.engagement_type = 'financial calculator'
ORDER BY
  i.engagement_date DESC; END

prompt: Identify customers in a particular state who have shown interest in mortgage loans and home equity products. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  c.state = 'particular_state'
  AND (
    m.product_interest = 'mortgage_loan'
    AND m.product_interest = 'home_equity'
  ) END

prompt: List customers in a certain ZIP code who frequently visit our physical branches and may be open to personal finance consultations. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.zip_postal_code
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  c.zip_postal_code = 'XXXXX' -- replace XXXXX with the desired ZIP code
  AND i.interaction_channel = 'Physical Store'
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 2; END

prompt: Provide a list of customers who have enrolled in our mobile app services in last 3 months and prefer digital communication. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
  JOIN communication co ON c.customer_id = co.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
  AND i.engagement_channel = 'mobile app'
  AND co.communication_channel = 'digital' END

prompt: Identify customers who have used our call center for support and are interested in in-person financial advice. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
  i.contact_communication_channel = 'call center'
  AND i.contact_communication_type = 'support'
  AND c.customer_id IN (
    SELECT
      customer_id
    FROM
      marketing
    WHERE
      product_interest = 'in-person financial advice'
  ) END

prompt: Give me a list of customers who are married, have children, and are interested in investment opportunities. ->
completion:
SELECT

FROM

  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE

  AND c.number_of_dependents > 0
  AND m.product_interest = 'investment' END

prompt: Identify customers who recently purchased a new home, use our mobile app frequently, and have expressed interest in mortgage refinancing. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events l ON c.customer_id = l.customer_id
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  l.life_event_type= 'Home Purchase'
  AND i.engagement_channel = 'mobile app'
  AND m.product_interest = 'mortgage refinancing'
ORDER BY
  t.transaction_date DESC; END

prompt: List customers who have a high credit score, frequently engage with our website, and are interested in wealth management services. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
count(*) as number of visits
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  c.credit_score = 'high'
  AND i.engagement_type = 'website'
  AND m.product_interest = 'wealth management services';
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id
HAVING
  COUNT(*) >= 2; END

prompt: Show me married customers with at least two dependents interested in home equity loans. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
WHERE
  c.marital_status = 'married'
  AND c.number_of_dependents >= 2

      marketing

  ); END

prompt: Identify single customers aged 30-40 with high credit scores and a preference for prepaid cards. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.age,
  c.credit_score,
  p.product
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  c.age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
  AND c.credit_score > 700
  AND m.product_interest = 'prepaid cards'; END

prompt: List customers who recently had a marriage life event and are interested in credit cards. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  le.life_event_type = 'marriage'
  AND m.product_interest = 'credit cards'
AND
  le.life_event_date >'2023-1-1'
ORDER BY
  le.life_event_date DESC
 END

prompt: Provide a list of customers who clicked on recent promotional emails and have made purchases in our physical stores. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN communication com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id
  JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id
WHERE
  com.contact_communication_channel = 'email'
  AND com.contact_communication_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
  AND t.transaction_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
 AND t.transaction_details like '%physical store%' END

prompt: Identify customers who have shared our social media content and have shown interest in auto loans. ->

  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  i.interaction_channel = 'social media'
  i.interaction_type='Share'
  AND m.product_interest = 'auto loans' END

prompt: List customers who have interacted with our chat support and have expressed interest in checking accounts. ->
completion:

   i.contact_communication_type = 'chat support'

prompt: Give me a list of customers who have expressed interest in personal loans and have an income level classified as 'High'. ->
completion:

WHERE

prompt: Identify customers who have inquired about credit cards and have recently moved to a new city. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name,
  c.mailing_address,
  c.city,
  c.state,
  c.zip_postal_code
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN communication com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
WHERE
  com.contact_communication_type = 'inquiry'
  AND le.life_event_type = 'moving'
  AND le.life_event_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH); END

prompt: Show me customers with declined loan requests who may be open to prepaid card offers. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN products t ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
  WHERE
p.product='Personal Loans'
  AND p.application_decision='declined'
 AND c.customer_id NOT IN (
    SELECT
      customer_id
    FROM
      products
    WHERE
      product = 'prepaid card'
  ) END

prompt: Identify approved auto loan applicants who are interested in credit cards with rewards programs. ->
completion:
SELECT DISTINCT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE
  p.product = 'auto loans'
  AND p.application_decision = 'approved'
  AND c.customer_id IN (
    SELECT
      customer_id
    FROM
      marketing
    WHERE
      product_interest = 'credit cards'
  ); END

prompt: Provide a list of customers who have recently experienced a major purchase life event and are interested in wealth management services. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
  count(le.life_event_type ) as number_of_purchases
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  le.life_event_type = 'major purchase'
le.life_event_date  >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 90 DAY)
  AND m.product_interest = 'wealth management'
GROUP BY c.customer_id
ORDER BY
le.life_event_date DESC END

prompt: List customers who have recently graduated and are interested in retirement planning. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN life_events le ON c.customer_id = le.customer_id
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
WHERE
  le.life_event_type = 'graduation'
  AND m.product_interest = 'retirement planning'
AND  AND le.life_event_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 30 DAY); END

prompt: Give me a list of customers who have frequently engaged with our mobile app and prefer email communication. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
  JOIN communication com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id
WHERE
  i.engagement_channel = 'mobile app'
  AND com.contact_communication_type = 'email'
AND i.interaction_date >= DATE_SUB (CURDATE (), INTERVAL 3 MONTH);
GROUP BY
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
HAVING
  COUNT(i.interaction_id) > 1; END

prompt: Identify customers who have shown interest in auto loans and prefer communication through phone calls. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN marketing m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id
JOIN communication com ON c.customer_id = com.customer_id
WHERE
  m.product_interest = 'auto loans'
AND com.contact_communication_type = 'email'
  AND (
    c.mobile_phone_number IS NOT NULL
    OR c.work_phone_number IS NOT NULL
    OR c.home_phone_number IS NOT NULL
  ) END

prompt: Show me customers aged 25-35 who have expressed interest in credit cards and have engaged with our website's financial planning resources. ->

WHERE

prompt: List customers who have recently moved to a new city, have viewed investment products on our website, and have expressed interest in savings accounts. ->
completion:

  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM

  JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id
WHERE

ORDER BY

prompt: Provide a list of customers who have recently requested information about new products and have shown interest in auto loans. ->
completion:

FROM

prompt: Give me a list of customers in a specific state who have engaged with our mobile app and may be interested in credit cards. ->
completion:
SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  c.first_name,
  c.last_name
FROM
  customers c
  JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE
